game.name: Papa’s Bakeria
game.description:
Referred to as the 12th game in the Papa Louie restaurant time-management series, Papa Bakeria is one of the hugely popular cooking games for girls. Being engaged in this cool free online game, you would get a chance to improve your time-management and customer handling skills. Let play this flash game in your browser now to enjoy the maximum fun!

So, you are ready to celebrate the 10th anniversary of Papa Louie while being hired for his biggest and highly popular restaurant – Papa Bakeria. Your primary job is to manage all the things in big-time bakery while serving the extremely delicious pies in town. Do not take a chance, choose the proper crust and fill them with the finest range of wild ingredients. Once you are done with it, all you need to do is to bake them to the maximum possible perfection. 

Give your pies finishing touches with an extensive array of toppings at the Top Station before delivering your order. Let yourself introduce first time to the brand new Sticker Section when you play Papa Bakeria. Once you are finished all the tasks, you are awarded 90 colorful Stickers during this fascinating game for girls. It will give you amazing customer dealing experience when you will unlock 101 wacky clients. Approximately 3 specific Stickers have been assigned to each of these customers. You will get the authority to present your customer a brand new outfit that you are only rewarded for collecting each of those stickers. 

All the best for giving your best to your new sweet job at Whiskview Mall! You are lucky enough to gain the trust from Papa Louie to run his brand new Bakeria. This pie management game ensures you to enjoy many things, including baking pies, earning big and keeping your customers happy.
